participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, enjoys family life and has a passion for design.
participant_1.background: I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh. I am a mother of two beautiful boys. I only eat organic food. I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business. I still dream about going to Paris and designing clothes.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Artistic and dedicated, values hard work and self-expression.
participant_2.background: I am single and live with my three cats. I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft. I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller. I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests. I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.

content.text: I'm a mother of two beautiful boys and I have a dog named Petrucci. What about you?
I'm single and live with my three cats. I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.
What kind of music do you like to create?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm especially passionate about rock and roll. I like to play guitar and sing.
I love rock and roll too! I play the drums and I sing a little bit.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for people to play music with.
Great! I'll send you a message.
